General.Name: Ningbo Sunrise Elc Technology Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Ningbo Sunrise Elc Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the manufactures and sale of precision components. The company offers automotive components, such as battery insert molding parts, electrical control insert molding parts, connectors, connector parts, copper busbars, and press-fit pins for new energy vehicles; and motor parts and shield plates. It also provides smart devices, including smart TV parts, set-top box, gateway, heatsinks and shielding, RF tuner, intelligent monitoring, smart meters, and other intelligent terminals. In addition, the company offers consumer electronic products, such as OA parts, TV tuners, parts for communication units and entertainment system, structural parts for servers, and various other electronic products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Cixi, China.
